parts.text:
I don't know your name! As an AI, I don't have access to personal information about you or who you are.

You can tell me if you'd like, or you can just continue our conversation!

As an AI, I don't have access to any personal information about you, including who your friends are. My knowledge is based on the data I was trained on, and I don't have any way to know details about your personal
life or the people you know.
My friend is Oybarchin. I'm Dilrabo
Okay, it's nice to know! So you're Dilrabo, and your friend is Oybarchin. Thanks for sharing!
Based on what you just told me, your friend is **Oybarchin**.

Got it! So you're a part of the **BTS ARMY**! That's a huge and passionate fandom.

As an AI, I don't have personal feelings, preferences, or the ability to be a fan of anything

or anyone, including musical groups. I can't "like" or "dislike" music in the way a human does.

However, I can process and provide information about BTS, their music, their achievements, or anything else
you'd like to discuss about them! So, feel free to ask me anything about BTS.
